analysis.key_quote: This "regulation" will result in a purge of talented, knowledgeable, dedicated employees who have been faithfully serving the American people and will leave a wake of devastation in this country it will take decades to recover from.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the potential for arbitrary firings and the loss of dedicated civil servants, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and due process protections.
